statements: SELECT * FROM security_patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC
SELECT patch_name, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT patch_id, patch_name FROM security_patches WHERE patch_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT patch_name FROM security_patches WHERE patch_description LIKE '%critical%'
SELECT * FROM security_patches ORDER BY device_id, patch_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM security_patches WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM security_patches WHERE patch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patch_id, patch_name, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT patch_id, device_id, patch_date FROM security_patches WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM security_patches WHERE patch_name LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT * FROM security_patches WHERE patch_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT patch_id, patch_version, release_date FROM security_patches WHERE device_id = 100;
SELECT device_id, manufacturer, last_update FROM devices ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, firmware_version FROM devices WHERE firmware_version LIKE '%1.2%';
SELECT * FROM security_patches WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM devices ORDER BY firmware_version DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM devices WHERE last_update > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, patch_version FROM devices JOIN security_patches ON devices.device_id = security_patches.device_id WHERE patch_version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT patch_version, release_date FROM security_patches WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPatches
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM SecurityPatches ORDER BY patch_date DESC
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM Devices WHERE device_location = 'Room A'
SELECT patch_name, patch_description, patch_date FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM Devices WHERE device_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM SecurityPatches WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patch_name, patch_description FROM SecurityPatches WHERE device_id = 3 AND patch_id IN (SELECT patch_id FROM PatchLogs);
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM Devices WHERE device_status = TRUE ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT patch_id, patch_name, patch_date FROM SecurityPatches INNER JOIN PatchLogs ON SecurityPatches.patch_id = PatchLogs.patch_id WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patches, device_type FROM Devices GROUP BY device_type HAVING total_patches > 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT patch_name, release_date FROM security_patches WHERE patch_id = 3;
SELECT device_id, patch_id, log_description FROM patch_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version, last_update FROM smart_home_devices WHERE firmware_version LIKE 'v2%';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM smart_home_devices WHERE firmware_version = 'v1.0';
SELECT patch_name, release_date FROM security_patches WHERE release_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT device_name, patch_name FROM smart_home_devices JOIN device_patches ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_patches.device_id JOIN security_patches ON device_patches.patch_id = security_patches.patch_id;
SELECT device_name, log_description FROM smart_home_devices JOIN patch_logs ON smart_home_devices.device_id = patch_logs.device_id;
SELECT * FROM security_patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT patch_name, patch_version FROM security_patches WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE last_update IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, device_id FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = 10 AND device_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM security_patches WHERE patch_version > 2.0;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(patch_id) FROM patch_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM security_patches WHERE patch_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_date < '2021-06-30';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY install_date DESC;
